abstract.p: Closings for Columbus Day and Yom Kippur noted (S)

block.p: Columbus Day, actually Oct. 12, will be legally observed. Yom Kippur is also observed on Monday.

NEW YORK GOVERNMENT OFFICES -- Federal, state and municipal offices closed. POST OFFICES -- Express Mail only; main post office on Eighth Avenue at 32nd Street is open. BANKS -- Option to close. PARKING -- Alternate-side regulations will be suspended. Meters still in effect unless otherwise denoted. SANITATION -- No pickups and no street cleaning. SCHOOLS -- Closed in New York City; option to close elsewhere. FINANCIAL MARKETS -- Stock markets are open, bond markets are closed. TRANSPORTATION -- New York City subways and buses will operate on a weekday schedule. The Long Island Rail Road and Metro-North will operate on a weekday schedule..
